page.title: 04Employment
page.content: Lancaster University is the largest employer in the area. It has brought much employment and trade.There are 650 academic staff who teach both undergraduates and post graduates. 250 men and women are employed in the university as engineers, secretaries and technicians in the administration and teaching departments. Besides these there are 500 ancillary workers; kitchen staff, porters, groundsmen etc. Thus around 1400 people have job directly because of the university. Outside the university the only other jobs are to be found on farms and most farms seem to be run by the family who owns them. The University also gives rise to jobs outside our area in neighbouring towns and villages. The students and staff bring trade to shops, catering establishments, pubs etc.They increase use of transport too
